00043 bool MyApp::OnInit()
00044 {
00045     // Create the main application window (a dialog in this case)
00046     // NOTE: Vertical dimension comprises the caption bar.
00047     //       Horizontal dimension has to take into account the thin
00048     //       hilighting border around the dialog (2 points in
00049     //       Win 95).
00050     ProfOptionsDialog *dialog = new ProfOptionsDialog((wxDialog*)NULL, -1, "Chameleon Options Manager",
00051         wxPoint(0, 0), wxSize(400, 300));
00052 
00053     // Center the dialog when first shown
00054     dialog->Centre();
00055 
00056     // Show it and tell the application that it's our main window
00057     dialog->Show(TRUE);
00058     SetTopWindow(dialog);
00059 
00060     return TRUE;
00061 }
